header.description: WP Travel Engine - Update Release Notes

sections.title: Welcome to WP Travel Engine 5.7
content: WP Travel Engine 5.7 introduces a brand new analytics page that offers a comprehensive view of your travel business's performance.
This page highlights the new features and resources for users to provide an understanding of those features.

sections.title: Overview
content: This tab displays various critical data within a specific period, which you can adjust to suit your needs from the top right-hand corner of your screen. The "Overview" tab enhances your understanding of crucial insights through interactive charts and graphs.

sections.title: Trips
content: This tab provides valuable details about your travel packages. You can also view the best selling trips including trip name, price, sales count, and payments received.

sections.title: Customers
content: This tab provides crucial insights into your customers, including: "Total Customers", "New Customers" & "Most Valued Customer".

sections.title: Dashboard Widget
content: The "WP Travel Engine Booking Summary" is a widget that gives you a clear and detailed view of your booking-related data in a simplified format.
